mathematica: max = 9; t[0, 0] = 1; t[n_, m_] /; n < m || m < 0 = 0; t[n_, m_] := t[n, m] = Sum[t[n-1, n-k], {k, m}]; tri = Table[t[n, m], {n, 0, max}, {m, 0, n}]; Flatten[ {Reverse[#[[1]]], #[[2]]} & /@ Partition[tri, 2]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 24 2011 *)

ox turn (xs:xss) = (if turn then reverse xs else xs) : ox (not turn) xss
